solution_line_template: Davante has {total_friends} friends because {multiplier} times {days_in_week} equals <<{multiplier}*{days_in_week}={total_friends}>>{total_friends}
Davante has {boy_friends} friends who are boys because {total_friends}-{girl_friends} equals <<{total_friends}-{girl_friends}={boy_friends}>>{boy_friends}
